0)","opacity":1,"w":85.5,"h":47.72,"rotate":0,"z-index":0,"fontSize":37.33,"id":"cbaca521-404b-4898-802a-b8db01e1a7d8","config":{"__cdata":"{\"opacity\":100,\"autoplay\":false,\"visible\":true,\"text\":\"

आपण आपल्या कामामध्ये वेगवेगळ्या प्रकारचे मोजमाप करत असतो. 

\\n\\n

 

\\n\\n

उदा. विहिरीतील पाण्याच्या पातळीचे मोजमाप, पिकाच्या पाण्याची गरज, इ. 

\\n\\n

 

\\n\\n

यासाठी आपल्याला सगळे एकक स्पष्ट माहित असणे महत्वाचे आहे. 

\\n\\n

 

\\n\\n

घनमीटर म्हणजे नक्की काय, मीटर आणि फुट यामध्ये काय फरक असतो हे आपल्याला माहित असणे गरजेचे असते.  

\\n\\n

 

\\n\\n

 

\\n\\n

या सत्रात आपण हे समजून घेणार आहोत. 

\\n\"}"}}],"image":[{"asset":"domain_5672_p_scale","x":51.5,"y":60.54,"w":44.67,"h":36.97,"rotate":0,"z-index":1,"id":"37b3bb34-ad37-42d7-ae2c-5a461a2b4460","config":{"__cdata":"{\"opacity\":100,\"strokeWidth\":1,\"stroke\":\"rgba(255, 255, 255, 0)\",\"autoplay\":false,\"visible\":true}"}}]},{"x":0,"y":0,"w":100,"h":100,"id":"b45b0994-0d1c-4d05-b34e-414ee34b1b0e","rotate":null,"config":{"__cdata":"{\"opacity\":100,\"strokeWidth\":1,\"stroke\":\"rgba(255, 255, 255, 0)\",\"autoplay\":false,\"visible\":true,\"color\":\"#FFFFFF\",\"genieControls\":false,\"instructions\":\"\"}"},"param":[{"name":"previous","value":"3d145a5b-81db-4d84-9108-a493bc4b921b"},{"name":"next","value":"1bae9bdb-2eec-4142-9c64-873ec19a9d02"}],"manifest":{"media":[]},"org.ekstep.richtext":[{"type":"rect","x":10,"y":20,"fill":"rgba(0, 0, 0, 0)","opacity":1,"w":59.38,"h":64.32,"rotate":0,"z-index":0,"fontSize":37.33,"id":"1bd5780d-e82e-428a-964d-8e026db831da","config":{"__cdata":"{\"opacity\":100,\"autoplay\":false,\"visible\":true,\"text\":\"

आपण कोणकोणते एकक बघणार आहोत:

\\n\\n

 

\\n\\n

१. क्षेत्रीय मोजमापाचे

\\n\\n

 

\\n\\n

२. भूजल मोजमापाचे

\\n\\n

 

\\n\\n

३. भूपृष्ठीय जलाचे मोजमाप

\\n\"}"}}]},{"x":0,"y":0,"w":100,"h":100,"id":"1bae9bdb-2eec-4142-9c64-873ec19a9d02","rotate":null,"config":{"__cdata":"{\"opacity\":100,\"strokeWidth\":1,\"stroke\":\"rgba(255, 255, 255, 0)\",\"autoplay\":false,\"visible\":true,\"color\":\"#FFFFFF\",\"genieControls\":false,\"instructions\":\"\"}"},"param":[{"name":"previous","value":"b45b0994-0d1c-4d05-b34e-414ee34b1b0e"},{"name":"next","value":"a25c1010-e10d-44a7-a439-c9033502a047"}],"manifest":{"media":[]},"org.ekstep.richtext":[{"type":"rect","x":9.03,"y":11.11,"fill":"rgba(0, 0, 0, 0)","opacity":1,"w":67.74,"h":75.37,"rotate":0,"z-index":0,"fontSize":37.33,"id":"9d7381cb-b4e9-4b4d-bdbd-b25020271907","config":{"__cdata":"{\"opacity\":100,\"autoplay\":false,\"visible\":true,\"text\":\"

क्षेत्रीय मोजमाप

\\n\\n

 

\\n\\n

 

\\n\\n

आपल्यासाठी खालील एकक महत्वाचे आहेत:

\\n\\n

 

\\n\\n

१. गुंठा

\\n\\n

२. एकर

\\n\\n

३. हेक्टर 

\\n\\n

४. चौरस मीटर

\\n\\n

५. चौरस किलोमीटर 

\\n\"}"}}]},{"x":0,"y":0,"w":100,"h":100,"id":"a25c1010-e10d-44a7-a439-c9033502a047","rotate":null,"config":{"__cdata":"{\"opacity\":100,\"strokeWidth\":1,\"stroke\":\"rgba(255, 255, 255, 0)\",\"autoplay\":false,\"visible\":true,\"color\":\"#FFFFFF\",\"genieControls\":false,\"instructions\":\"\"}"},"param":[{"name":"previous","value":"1bae9bdb-2eec-4142-9c64-873ec19a9d02"},{"name":"next","value":"1286bc4c-2c28-4dd7-a7a9-08da49847ce3"}],"manifest":{"media":[]},"org.ekstep.richtext":[{"type":"rect","x":10,"y":13.33,"fill":"rgba(0, 0, 0, 0)","opacity":1,"w":77.7,"h":71.6,"rotate":0,"z-index":0,"fontSize":37.33,"id":"b7132ce9-a462-4893-8638-674a2356a832","config":{"__cdata":"{\"opacity\":100,\"autoplay\":false,\"visible\":true,\"text\":\"

भूजलाचे मोजमाप

\\n\\n

 

\\n\\n

 

\\n\\n

 

\\n\\n

 

\\n\\n

 

\\n\\n

आपण खालील एकक वापरणार आहोत:

\\n\\n

 

\\n\\n

१. मीटर: पाणी पातळीची नोंद ठेवायला

\\n\\n

 

\\n\\n

२. घन मीटर: एकूण भूजलाचा उपसा किंवा पुनर्भरण समजून घेण्यासाठी 

\\n\\n

 

\\n\\n

 

\\n\"}"}}]},{"x":0,"y":0,"w":100,"h":100,"id":"1286bc4c-2c28-4dd7-a7a9-08da49847ce3","rotate":null,"config":{"__cdata":"{\"opacity\":100,\"strokeWidth\":1,\"stroke\":\"rgba(255, 255, 255, 0)\",\"autoplay\":false,\"visible\":true,\"color\":\"#FFFFFF\",\"genieControls\":false,\"instructions\":\"\"}"},"param":[{"name":"previous","value":"a25c1010-e10d-44a7-a439-c9033502a047"}],"manifest":{"media":[]},"org.ekstep.richtext":[{"type":"rect","x":12.78,"y":4.69,"fill":"rgba(0, 0, 0, 0)","opacity":1,"w":70.43,"h":50.62,"rotate":0,"z-index":0,"fontSize":37.33,"id":"5da8c07d-c23a-4b8e-9ecb-eb9227726c46","config":{"__cdata":"{\"opacity\":100,\"autoplay\":false,\"visible\":true,\"text\":\"
